Philosophy & coding conventionsÂ¶

  1. There should be one way to do it for each possible use case

  2. Use tabs, not spaces

    1. 4 spaces per tab

  3. Naming convention

    1. Always use verbNoun format for functions. For example, use mergeArray, not arrayMerge

    2. Capitalization

      1. For classes, use EachWordCapitalized

      2. For functions and other variables, dontCapitalizeTheFirstWord

      3. No snake casing
